Text: Is this Episode 13, aired on March 25th?
yes this is episode 13, 11-12 was a double aired march 18th

You are getting the episodes mixed up, the first new episode, which was a double, is simply episode 11.
This episode, which is correctly named, is the one aired on March 25th.
Episode 13 is the next one on April 1st.

I don't agree, all the epsode guides states that the double episode as 11-12, so this should be 13. the next should be 14. i have been looking for episode 13 for days and didnt know that the name was wrong.
and the packed rar files are called 113
After looking at the ABC official website episode listing for Flasforward, there apparently is no episode 12.

11 	"Revelation Zero (Part 1)" 	John Polson 	Seth Hoffman & Marc Guggenheim 	March 18, 2010 

Mark must see a therapist after he is suspended from duty. Demetri takes on a partner in his search for Lloyd. Nicole seeks help in understanding her horrifying flashforward. 

12 	"Revelation Zero (Part 2)" 	Constantine Makris & John Polson 	Quinton Peeples 	March 18, 2010 

Janis goes with Simon to Toronto and learns some family secrets. 

13 	"Blowback" 	Constantine Makris 	Lisa Zwerling & Barbara Nance 	March 25, 2010
